mapper.select: SELECT n.notice_id, n.member_id, n.category, n.title, n.content, n.view_count, n.is_fixed, n.created_at, n.updated_at, m.name AS member_name FROM notice_tb n LEFT JOIN member_tb m ON n.member_id = m.member_id ORDER BY n.is_fixed DESC, n.created_at DESC

SELECT n.notice_id, n.member_id, n.category, n.title, n.content, n.view_count, n.is_fixed, n.created_at, n.updated_at, m.name AS member_name FROM notice_tb n LEFT JOIN member_tb m ON n.member_id = m.member_id WHERE n.category = #{category} ORDER BY n.is_fixed DESC, n.created_at DESC

SELECT n.notice_id, n.member_id, n.category, n.title, n.content, n.view_count, n.is_fixed, n.created_at, n.updated_at, m.name AS member_name FROM notice_tb n LEFT JOIN member_tb m ON n.member_id = m.member_id WHERE n.title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR n.content LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY n.is_fixed DESC, n.created_at DESC

SELECT n.notice_id, n.member_id, n.category, n.title, n.content, n.view_count, n.is_fixed, n.created_at, n.updated_at, m.name AS member_name FROM notice_tb n LEFT JOIN member_tb m ON n.member_id = m.member_id WHERE n.notice_id = #{noticeId}
mapper.update: UPDATE notice_tb SET category = #{category}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, is_fixed = NVL(#{is_fixed}, is_fixed), updated_at = SYSDATE WHERE notice_id = #{notice_id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT n.notice_id, n.member_id, n.category, n.title, n.content, n.view_count, n.is_fixed, n.created_at, n.updated_at, m.name AS member_name FROM notice_tb n LEFT JOIN member_tb m ON n.member_id = m.member_id WHERE n.is_fixed = 1 ORDER BY n.created_at DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM ( SELECT n.notice_id, n.member_id, n.category, n.title, n.content, n.view_count, n.is_fixed, n.created_at, n.updated_at, m.name AS member_name FROM notice_tb n LEFT JOIN member_tb m ON n.member_id = m.member_id WHERE n.is_fixed = 0 ORDER BY n.created_at DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{startRow} + #{pageSize} ) WHERE RN > #{startRow}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM ( SELECT n.notice_id, n.member_id, n.category, n.title, n.content, n.view_count, n.is_fixed, n.created_at, n.updated_at, m.name AS member_name FROM notice_tb n LEFT JOIN member_tb m ON n.member_id = m.member_id WHERE n.is_fixed = 0 AND (n.title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR n.content LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') ORDER BY n.created_at DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{startRow} + #{pageSize} ) WHERE RN > #{startRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notice_tb WHERE is_fixed = 0
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notice_tb WHERE category = #{category} AND is_fixed = 0
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notice_tb WHERE is_fixed = 0 AND (title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR content LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%')
